title: Is it necessary to do internship in 2nd sem holidays?

comments.body:
yes, its absolutely mandatory that you're done with at least 3-4 internships before you start second year

if you dont then suryaprasad with personally come and shatter your kneecaps and send a mentor prof to ur house to tourment you for daring to stay unemployed & useless for so long

on a more real note, its not really *necessary* per se, if you want to do some go ahead, it will certainly help you later on when applying for jobs. just dont punish yourself if you dont manage to get one

It's not mandatory and if you are getting internship anywhere in your area of interest then you can intern there and you cab add in your experience.if you don't get that's fine chill in holidays and prepare your mindset for next sem. All the best üëç
not necessary, you can still do it if u feel so, and if u have an offer
How about you think about it before asking such shit questions, if you would have throught about it you wouldn't have asked it
Its better for you if you do internships in your summer. Take it from a senior who wishes they had done one.
